pageProduct.name: Oral B Gum Care & Whitening Toothpaste 110g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Oral-B Gum Care & Whitening Toothpaste Mint revitalises your gums in 2 weeks with gentle, enamel safe whitening.

Oral-B Gum Care & Whitening promotes healthy gums by fighting plaque bacteria along the gumline and slowing its re-growth. The polyphosphate technology removes surface stains to gently whiten teeth.

Its ActivRepair Technology is proven to target the gumline area combining:

Gentle antibacterial action on gums. Revitalises gums. Restores weakened enamel.

Strengthening action on enamel. It creates a shield against acid erosion and actively restores weakened enamel.

Flouride toothpaste for daily use.

Revitalises Your Gums in 2 Weeks With Gentle, Enamel Safe Whitening.

Size: 110g

KEY FEATURES

• Its ActivRepair™ technology is proven to target the gumline area combining:
• Gentle antibacterial action on gums. It defends from bacteria and actively revitalises your gums.
• Strengthening action on enamel. It creates a shield against acid erosion and actively restores weakened enamel.
• Oral-B #1 brand used by dentists worldwide

Warnings

Do not swallow. Do not use this product in children 12 years of age or less. In case of intake of fluoride from other sources, consult a dentist or doctor.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Tube has been sealed for your protection. Do not use if seal on tube is broken or missing.

Ingredients

Contains Stannous Fluoride and Sodium Fluoride. Glycerin, Hydrated Silica, Sodium Hexametaphosphate, PEG-6, Propylene Glycol, Water, Zinc Lactate, Flavour, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Gluconate, Carrageenan, Trisodium Phosphate, Stannous Fluoride, Mica, Sodium Saccharin, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Fluoride, Titanium Dioxide, CI 74260, CI 74160.

Contains: Revitalises gums. Restores weakened enamel.

Directions

Apply the product onto a soft bristled toothbrush. Brush teeth thoroughly at least twice a day (morning and evening) or as recommended by a dentist.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
